tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE goods_tracking(
    id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    RFID_tag VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE rfid_tags (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goods_id INT,
    tag_status CHAR(1),
    tag_location VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (goods_id) REFERENCES goods_tracking(id)
);

CREATE TABLE movements (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    movement_id VARCHAR(50),
    goods_id INT REFERENCES goods(id),
    from_location_id INT REFERENCES locations(id),
    to_location_id INT REFERENCES locations(id),
    movement_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shipment_date DATE,
  origin_location VARCHAR(50),
  destination_location VARCHAR(50),
  current_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  weight DECIMAL(10, 2),
  category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_tags (
  tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  shipment_id INT,
  tag_code VARCHAR(50),
  tag_location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tag_id INT,
  movement_date DATETIME,
  from_location VARCHAR(50),
  to_location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Transport_Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    delivery_date DATE,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    source_location VARCHAR(100),
    destination_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE RFID_Tags (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_number VARCHAR(20),
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    current_location VARCHAR(100),
    last_scan_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Shipping_Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_description TEXT,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    tag_id INT REFERENCES RFID_Tags(tag_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Warehouse_Inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Transport_Vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    route_description TEXT,
    current_location VARCHAR(100),
    last_update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
